about_the_game:
“Back to the starting point again, why?”
“I've been trapped here for 11 hours and 45 minutes.”
“This is my 14th time returning here,”
“I was just about to leave after visiting,But I don't know why,No matter what I do, I end up here.”
“Am I dreaming?”
“I've noticed the numbers on the wall changing.Maybe it's related.”
“There's also a password lock, but I don't know what it's for.”
“And where the password is.”
“With caution, I'll definitely find my way out.”

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After reading the above, I'm believe you should have a general idea of what the game should do and what the purpose is.

Hearing about it too often can lead to memory loss.
Come on, it's time to test your memory.

There are 86 anomalies in total, most of which are relatively simple.
If there is no abnormality, please go into the door behind you now.
If there is an abnormality, please go into another door.
If you take a wrong turn, you'll go back to square one.
The scene is dark, and you need to use a flashlight.

I have a good news and a bad news

Good News: There is a cabinet.
Bad News: There is a cabinet.

But don't worry, you can run fast and there are no physical limitations.
So what is the cabinet for? Maybe it's just a decoration.

Sources of inspiration

《The Exit 8》

Play Time

30-60 minutes

Numbers of anomalies

86 anomalies

Number of Endings

2 endings

Game Viewpoint

Support first-person and third-person switching.

WASD - Move
Shift - Run
E - Interact
F - Use The Flashlight
V - Switch Perspectives

[/h2]Number Of Players[/h2]
Single Player

Free to Distribution

I'd appreciate it if you could mention the name or Steam link of the game somewhere.

Stacking Armour Disclaimer

The language is recommended to use Chinese or English, because the translation is relatively accurate.
This is the first game I've ever made.I learned game development from scratch.
I practiced for two and a half weeks by meself.This game is all voiced by me,
If you feel unsatisfactory, I'll keep studying hard and try to make a better game next time.
Thank you for your support, and I hope you enjoy playing.

“Back to the starting point again, why?”

“This is my 14th time returning here,”

“And where the password is.”

name: Gallery X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7-6700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: "Will you be the next one to get out of here alive?" GalleryX, a horror game that focuses on observation and memory.In the dim environment, there are 86 anomalies, 2 endings, different experiences,waiting for you to explore.Please watch out for enemies.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese*, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
*languages with full audio support
